TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IChannelFactory implements class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject

summary.span: 定义必须由通道工厂实现来生成通道的接口。

span.span: Defines the interface that must be implemented by a channel factory to produce channels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口表示通道工厂的基接口。The interface represents the base interface for channel factories. 通道工厂及其关联通道通常由启动通信的服务的客户端使用。Channel factories and their associated channels are generally used by the clients of a service that initiate communication. 与此相反，实现 接口的侦听器工厂及其关联侦听器则提供一些机制用于接受通道，与服务的通信是通过这些通道启动的。Listener factories that implement the interface and their associated listeners, by contrast, provide the mechanisms used to accept the channels through which communications with a service is initiated.

MemberSignature.Value: public T GetProperty<T> () where T : class;
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !!T GetProperty<class T>() cil managed
Public Function GetProperty(Of T As Class) () As T

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 方法正在查询的类型化对象。

span.span: The typed object for which the method is querying.

summary.span: 从通道堆栈的适当层返回所请求的类型化对象（如果存在）。

span.span: Returns a typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the channel stack.

returns.span: 如果存在，则返回所请求的类型化对象 ，如果不存在，则返回 。

span.span: The typed object requested, if it is present, or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可请求从通道堆栈的适当层返回一个类型化对象，如用于设置属性或获取状态的接口。Use this to request a typed object such as an interface for setting properties or getting status from the appropriate layer in the channel stack. 如果某个层支持返回所请求的对象，则该层会返回对象。If a layer supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不支持，则该层会将调用委托给堆栈中的下一层。If not, it delegates the call down to the next layer in the stack. 如果到达堆栈底部仍然没有通道层支持所请求的对象，则该方法返回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no channel layer supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`. 任何时候要实现通道工厂，都必须实现 。You must implement whenever you implement a channel factory. 要沿通道工厂堆栈进行通信， 是一种极好的方式，它无需知道下面有哪些通道工厂，也无需知道上面有哪些通道工厂希望执行查询。 is an excellent way to communicate information along the channel factory stack without having to know what channel factories are below you, or what channel factories above you are interested in performing queries. 定义一些接口，供人们查询您所拥有任何相关信息。Define interfaces for people to query on for any interesting information you have. 如果不能识别 的类型参数，则委托给堆栈中的下一个通道工厂，如果要在堆栈底部创建一个新传输通道，则返回 `null`。Whenever you do not recognize the type argument for , delegate down to the next channel factory in the stack or return `null` if you are creating a new transport channel at the bottom of the stack.
